title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published to npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) for using Ollama models in chains & agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface) with Docker one-liner.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli (node)
summary: Npm-published CLI that wraps Ollama with prompt templating and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s slot.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library for Ollama with strong naming and NuGet package.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that bridges channels to Ollama for on-prem AI assistance.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that proxies to Ollama with token streaming.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama with generate/chat/embed endpoints.
